Export.Routine: WWWLS ;WWWLS;DT;LISTSTART;30.07.1997 ; ;/------------------------------------------------------------------\ ;| Description of Function : ;| LISTSTART ;| ;| Inputs : ;| ;| ;| ByRef : ;| ;| ;| Returns : ;| ;| ;| History : ;| ;| DT 30.07.1997 ;| ;\------------------------------------------------------------------/ ; ;nicht mehr nÃ¶tig ;not more necessary ;(C) BY DITMAR TYBUSSEK DO ^WWWVORG SET YVOR=$GET(^WWW012(0,YM,1)) DO ^WWWSTART() DO:YUSER="" IF YUSER'="" IF $PIECE($GET(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1)),Y,6)=0 DO . IF YUSER'="" SET $PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,6)=1 . WRITE "<BODY" . IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,3)'="" WRITE " BACKGROUND="_""""_YGIF_$PIECE(YVOR,Y,3)_"""" . IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,4)=1 WRITE " BGPROPERTIES=fixed" . IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,5)'="" DO . . IF $LENGTH($PIECE(YVOR,Y,5))=6 WRITE " BGCOLOR="_""""_"#"_$PIECE(YVOR,Y,5)_"""" . . IF $LENGTH($PIECE(YVOR,Y,5))'=6 WRITE " BGCOLOR="_""""_$PIECE($GET(^WWW100(0,"FARBE",SPRACHE,$PIECE(YVOR,Y,5),1)),Y,1)_"""" . . QUIT . WRITE ">" . QUIT WRITE YCR QUIT
